title: PBE Signups
body: When will the PBE signups be reopened? I know there was a discussion about the PBE signups being closed 6 Months ago and there hasn't been anything since.

replies.body: No ETA just yet, but keep an eye on our[ PBE status page ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)for more updates.
